channel.title: How do i make myself admin?
channel.description: ok i think im using a delta base its the whip lash source, said it was delta and ddspecced? idk but how do i make myself admin, i searched for playerrights in the client folder and couldnt find it, and u cant change it in characters file, please help, Thanks :o

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“klimpet, post:11, topic:259982”]To Make Your Self Admin With Silver Crown or Owner With Gold crown Open your Characters file and find your name after you find your name open the file and you will se Character-Rights = 0 Change The 0 to 2 For Admin Or 3 For Owner.[/quote]This has been answered your post is not needed.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself admin?

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @klimpet klimpet
item.description:
@klimpet wrote:

To Make Your Self Admin With Silver Crown or Owner With Gold crown Open your Characters file and find your name after you find your name open the file and you will se Character-Rights = 0 Change The 0 to 2 For Admin Or 3 For Owner.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“koppinator, post:7, topic:259982”]it didn’t work
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 07:41:19 am[/size][hr]i changed it at player class[/quote]Gosh.
Logout from the server. Open /Characters search for your file open it look at Character-Rights = 0.
Change the 0 to 1 for Moderator and 2 for Administrator then save it and log back in.
~YOU NEED TO BE LOGGED OUT~

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You need to be logged off from your character first. Once you change the rights, close and save the txt file, and log back on.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make myself admin?
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“koppinator, post:3, topic:259982”]but were can i change the rights???[/quote]Multiple accounts?..
Open the character folder, look for PlayerRights = 0, or something. Change that to 2.
